name: Lifebuoy Hand Wash Pouch Kitchen Fresh
description: Chopping onions, garlic, radish, fish can cause foul odours to linger on your hands. Keep both germs and bad odours  away from your hands with Lifebuoy kitchen fresh handwash. The unique formula, with the power of lemons can remove 99.9 percent germs in just 10 seconds and keeps the odour away. Take a few drops, add water and rub the hands together to create foam and lather. Rub the back of your hands as well as your fingertips and nails. Rinse with water and dry with a clean cloth.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
